Life

About Painting Wall

  • wall color: Canadian Tire Premier brand color code:Sunbeam, type “eggshell”
  • small can: $25.99, can only afford 1-1.5 layer of hallway plus 2 layers of bedroom wall
  • paint is easily to get dried, and it will stick on the roller, makes it hard to paint, and make roller drop hairs.
  • Don’t buy roller foam in Dollar store, its foam easily drops hairs
    • Later notice that even expensive roller foam drops hairs when it is too dry
  • There are four types of roller foam sizes for differnt kinds of surfaces (smooth, smi-smooth, etc)

About algae on wood deck

  • mix water with white vineger, use kitchen cleaning scrub sponge to scrub the algae, easily remove the algae from the deck
